    • addEnquiry

      public int addEnquiry(String enquiry, String ownerid, int campid)
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller addEnquiry adds an enquiry to the list of enquiries in MainController's attributes also tags the enquiry to the camp and user
      Specified by:
      addEnquiry in interface EnquiryController
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry text to be added
      ownerid - the owner of the enquiry, which should be a student
      campid - the camp the enquiry is about
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not
